jaina:ApexisBlast.NAME: Apexis Blast

jaina:ArcaneGate.DESCRIPTION: Whenever your play an jaina:Arcane card, deal !M! damage.

jaina:Counterspell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose one: NL Gain 1 Intangible, 1 jaina:Buffer, or 1 Artifact.

jaina:DeckOfWonders.NAME: Deck of Wonders

jaina:DeepFreeze.NAME: Deep Freeze
jaina:DeepFreeze.DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 jaina:Frozen to ALL enemies. NL For each enemy that is completely jaina:Frozen this way, gain [E] and draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

jaina:Duplicate.NAME: Duplicate
jaina:Duplicate.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. Add a copy of it into your hand. NL You may not choose another copy of this card to be copied.

jaina:IceLance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a jaina:Frozen enemy. If the enemy isn't already jaina:Frozen, instead apply !M! jaina:Frozen and exhaust.
